channel.title: [508] general help
channel.description:
I am really new to 508s so i need some help in finding stuff.
1. where do i change shop items and locations. 2. How do i change npc drops. 3. How do i fix/add specials (at least tell the file) 4. When i trade shops, there is now sell option. I still have the weild, use, etc. options. and maybe more...
Thanks for help.
~|Darkning|~

  2. How do i change npc drops.

Thanks for help.

  1. ShopHandler class
  2. NpcDrops class, and the NPC class
  3. PlayerCombat class
